rows.label: qev050108_MSG0001
rows.name:
We lost again, my brother.
It seems we have much growing left to do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050108_MSG0002
rows.name:
Yet I feel no regret. For even in defeat,
we have gained much.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050108_MSG0003
rows.name:
And we will continue to grow so long as we stay
together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050108_MSG0004
rows.name:
Bah! I would have it no other way. One day soon,
all of Mira will be chanting our names.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050108_MSG0005
rows.name:
Since when did your ambitions run so small?
Aim for the galaxy at the very least![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050108_MSG0006
rows.name:
Ha ha ha ha! Well said! As I recall, that was our
dream as young cubs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050108_MSG0007
rows.name:
Thank you, [ST:playername ].
You have helped us recover so muchâ€”
including some long-lost ambitions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050108_MSG0008
rows.name:
Heh. My pulse dances in anticipation. Come, Ziorde!
Let us begin our training immediately![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050108_MSG0009
rows.name: Yes. We have no more time to waste.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050108_MSG0010
rows.name:
It will not be long until we have strength to rival even
yours, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050108_MSG0011
rows.name:
I hope you will favor us with another match then.
Until that day, be well.[ST:wait ]
